abstract: Kim Young-kwang (Hangul: 김영광, born 28 June 1983 in Goheung, Jeonnam) is a South Korean football player, who is currently playing for Ulsan Hyundai.
comment: Kim Young-kwang (Hangul: 김영광, born 28 June 1983 in Goheung, Jeonnam) is a South Korean football player, who is currently playing for Ulsan Hyundai.
